程序包 si.model

类 AsteroidsGame

java.lang.Object
si.model.AsteroidsGame
所有已实现的接口:
ucd.comp2011j.engine.Game
public class AsteroidsGame extends Object implements ucd.comp2011j.engine.Game
The Asteroids class represents the main game logic and state for the Asteroids game. It implements the Game interface.
